name: SCNPhysicsFieldScope
desc: Options for defining the region of space affected by a physics field, used by the scope property.

items.name: case insideExtent
items.desc: The field’s effect applies only to objects within the region of space defined by its position and extent.

items.name: case outsideExtent
items.desc: The field’s effect applies only to objects outside the region of space defined by its position and extent.
